title: Advanced Computer Networking and Data Communication Collaborative Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic programming and network fundamentals theory understanding
context.additional_context: Optimized content delivery for smartphone-based mobile learning environments, utilizing mobile-friendly tools for non-face-to-face collaborative learning.

learning_goals: Teams collaboratively design actual network problem diagnosis and resolution processes
Simulate and explain data communication protocol analysis and optimization strategies using mobile tools
Through reflective journaling and peer assessment, students can objectively analyze and improve their contributions to team projects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
